Text: th floor Cc Tana The suite of offices on will be complete with a fax machine and an additional analog line for PC dialup access by close of business today The only exception to your requirements is for an additional table in the empty room I believe that will be in by mid day tomorrow We will prepare Thursday

RE th floorYes it will also be there today Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Wednesday December PM To Jameson Lance Subject RE th floor Werent we also going to get a printer in the area Original Message From Jameson Lance Sent Wednesday December PM To Jones Tana Cc Witherspoon Joe Subject th floor Tana The suite of offices on will be complete with a fax machine and an additional analog line for PC dialup access by close of business today The only exception to your requirements is for an additional table in the empty room I believe that will be in by mid day tomorrow We will prepare Thursday

RE th floorIve been advised that its complete but havent confirmed Ill let you know in a little bit Lance D Jameson PMP Sent by Blackberry Wireless Original Message From Jones Tana Tana NRONcom To Jameson Lance Lance NRONcom CC Cook Mary Mary NRONcom Sent Thu Dec Subject RE th floor Lance I just spoke to Mary Cook and she would like all four areas done by the end of today Is that doable Original Message From Jameson Lance Sent Thursday December AM To Jones Tana Subject RE th floor Will do Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Wednesday December PM To Jameson Lance Subject RE th floor Lance Can you have your install people mark with a yellow sticky or something where the analog lines for the PCs are located Much thanks Original Message From Jameson Lance Sent Wednesday December PM To Jones Tana Subject RE th floor Yes it will also be there today Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Wednesday December PM To Jameson Lance Subject RE th floor Werent we also going to get a printer in the area Original Message From Jameson Lance Sent Wednesday December PM To Jones Tana Cc Witherspoon Joe Subject th floor Tana The suite of offices on will be complete with a fax machine and an additional analog line for PC dialup access by close of business today The only exception to your requirements is for an additional table in the empty room I believe that will be in by mid day tomorrow We will prepare Thursday

RE th floor h m Call if you need me But I really hope you dont need it Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Thursday December PM To Jameson Lance Subject RE th floor Mary Cook wants me to put together a list of peoples home ph cell nospagers in case we need to call in help during the holidays Can you provide me with your info in case we get surprised and have to set up additonal data rooms Much thanks Original Message From Jameson Lance Sent Thursday December PM To Jones Tana Subject RE th floor Ive been advised that its complete but havent confirmed Ill let you know in a little bit Lance D Jameson PMP Sent by Blackberry Wireless Original Message From Jones Tana Tana NRONcom To Jameson Lance Lance NRONcom CC Cook Mary Mary NRONcom Sent Thu Dec Subject RE th floor Lance I just spoke to Mary Cook and she would like all four areas done by the end of today Is that doable Original Message From Jameson Lance Sent Thursday December AM To Jones Tana Subject RE th floor Will do Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Wednesday December PM To Jameson Lance Subject RE th floor Lance Can you have your install people mark with a yellow sticky or something where the analog lines for the PCs are located Much thanks Original Message From Jameson Lance Sent Wednesday December PM To Jones Tana Subject RE th floor Yes it will also be there today Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Wednesday December PM To Jameson Lance Subject RE th floor Werent we also going to get a printer in the area Original Message From Jameson Lance Sent Wednesday December PM To Jones Tana Cc Witherspoon Joe Subject th floor Tana The suite of offices on will be complete with a fax machine and an additional analog line for PC dialup access by close of business today The only exception to your requirements is for an additional table in the empty room I believe that will be in by mid day tomorrow We will prepare Thursday

RE th floorIm on it I have the Fax and Printers stashed away I just need to move them up and plug them in Ill get that done by close of business Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Thursday December PM To Jameson Lance Cc Gonzalez Esmeralda Subject RE th floor Importance High Lance I just walked the floors to check out our data rooms and noticed the following Area we only have one telephone Can we get another installed There was no indication of where the portal was for the laptop a yellow sticky that says portal here The fax machine is low on toner How can we locate toner at this late date to fit that fax machine The three remaining areas still need their fax printers and portals The fourth area Room does not have a working phone Esmeralda what is the status of our coffee thermoss coffee cups sugar creamer office supplies I noticed the printer in was low on paper Can we get some printer paper brought down The conference room on needs the coffee thermoss and ice bucket rinsed out theyve got old stuff in them Rooms need to be straighted up a bit Can you take a look at thisor do you want to go down together Lance Esmeralda I am attaching a list of the current Data Rooms for your assistance Original Message From Jameson Lance Sent Thursday December PM To Jones Tana Subject RE th floor h m Call if you need me But I really hope you dont need it Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Thursday December PM To Jameson Lance Subject RE th floor Mary Cook wants me to put together a list of peoples home ph cell nospagers in case we need to call in help during the holidays Can RE th floorThe analog lines are tagged right on the user end of the cord with yellow stickies with their extension numbers written on them as youd asked Ill have you the fax numbers in a couple minutes Im out of the office for a couple of hours Lance D Jameson PMP Sent by Blackberry Wireless Original Message From Jones Tana Tana NRONcom To Jameson Lance Lance NRONcom Sent Fri Dec Subject RE th floor I cant tell the fax numbers on some of the faxes and where the analog lines are Can you meet with me Original Message From Jameson Lance Sent Thursday December PM To Jones Tana Cc Gonzalez Esmeralda Witherspoon Joe Subject RE th floor Importance High Room phone printer and Fax machine Room phone Room C phone and analog line Room Phone and analog line and printer Room phone and polycom and fax machine Room two phones and analog line Room hallway fax machine and analog line Room phone and printer Room phone Room phone and printer and fax machine Room phone Lance D Jameson PMP Sent by Blackberry Wireless

RE th floorWill do ASAP Sorry Lance D Jameson PMP Sent by Blackberry Wireless Original Message From Jones Tana Tana NRONcom To Jameson Lance Lance NRONcom CC Tholan Scott Scott NRONcom Sent Fri Dec Subject RE th floor It appears that the fax you moved in on the rd floor was actively being used by Scott Tholan and his assistant on that floor x Can your people please move it back ASAP and find us another one Thanks Original Message From Jameson Lance Sent Friday December AM To Jones Tana Subject RE th floor The analog lines are tagged right on the user end of the cord with yellow stickies with their extension numbers written on them as youd asked Ill have you the fax numbers in a couple minutes Im out of the office for a couple of hours Lance D Jameson PMP Sent by Blackberry Wireless Original Message From Jones Tana Tana NRONcom To Jameson Lance Lance NRONcom Sent Fri Dec Subject RE th floor I cant tell the fax numbers on some of the faxes and where the analog lines are Can you meet with me Original Message From Jameson Lance Sent Thursday December PM To Jones Tana Cc Gonzalez Esmeralda Witherspoon Joe Subject RE th floor Importance High Room phone printer and Fax machine Room phone Room C phone and analog line Room Phone and analog line and printer Room phone and polycom and fax machine Room two phones and analog line Room hallway fax machine and analog line Room phone and printer Room phone Room phone and printer and fax machine Room phone Lance D Jameson PMP Sent by Blackberry Wireless

FW Recording Trades from made on Mobile phonesdiscussed Forwarded by Lance JamesonENRONDEVELOPMENT on AM Robert CT AM To Lance JamesonENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Subject FW Recording Trades from made on Mobile phones Forwarded by Robert KnightHOUECT on AM Keith nronXgate AM To Robert CT cc Subject FW Recording Trades from made on Mobile phones Robert Did we ever get an answer to this Original Message From Bruce Michelle Sent Wednesday November AM To McAuliffe Bob Dziadek Keith Cc Burchfield Richard Subject Re Recording Trades from made on Mobile phones Any progress Forwarded by Michelle BruceHOUECT on PM Richard Burchfield AM To Bob McAuliffeCorpEnron Keith DziadekNAEnron cc Michelle CT Subject Re Recording Trades from made on Mobile phones Bob or Keith Any thoughts on the below issue Richard Forwarded by Richard BurchfieldHOUECT on AM Michelle Bruce AM To Richard CT cc Cindy CT Scott CT Subject Re Recording Trades from made on Mobile phones Help More trading on unrecorded lines Thanks Michelle xt Forwarded by Michelle BruceHOUECT on AM Cindy Horn AM Sent by Cindy Horn To Michelle CT Carol CT cc Scott CT Subject Re Recording Trades from made on Mobile phones Could you check with the telephonic IT group there and see if they can do something similar so that even the traders trading off of their cell phones can go to a recorded line Trade capture via cell phones has been a consistent audit point Let me know if I can assist Thanks Cindy Forwarded by Cindy HornLONECT on Andy Cowx To Cindy CT cc Scott CT Nigel CT Subject Re Recording Trades from made on Mobile phones Cindy Its not feasible at all in the other offices as they dont utilise the same type of recording systems London has the ability to record every single conversation in or out of the building I am drafting a note to go out in the next Euroflash to launch the service Thanks Andy Cindy Horn Sent by Cindy Horn To Andy CT cc Nigel CT Martin CT Kenneth CT Scott CT Subject Re Recording Trades from made on Mobile phones Have you found anything out on this for the Houston and Singapore offices yet How would the Sydney office handle this Thanks for doing this for London Did the email go out telling traders how to do this Thanks Cindy Forwarded by Cindy HornLONECT on Cindy Horn To Andy CT cc Nigel CT Martin CT Kenneth CT Subject Re Recording Trades from made on Mobile phones This is great news Can you handle sending this announcement as I assume this was an audit issue for the other trading groups as well Also how can we get this same process in place for the Houston and Singapore offices They have the same issues on their audits Thanks you guys did a great job Cindy Andy Cowx To Cindy CT cc Nigel CT Martin CT Kenneth CT Subject Recording Trades from made on Mobile phones Cindy We have some good news for you We have set up a number which can only be called from Enron Mobile phones when you dial this number you will hear dialtone The dialtone is coming from the phone system at Enron House you are then able to dial exactly as if you were at your desk ie dial and the number you wish to reach All calls coming through this route will be recorded and can be retrieved by the telecoms team for playback reference We have also ensured that external people cannot dial this number from outside the building by using Let me know if you want to issue a note as a General Announcement or whether you wish to handle the distribution of the number Regards Andy x Cindy Horn To Andy CT cc Nigel CT Subject Re Who should I talk to on this one Instead of providing a phone number could there be a short code or something that they do that in the background dials this number so no one gets access to this number I know that this is an issue in all of the offices with traders making deals on cell phones on unrecorded lines I do not want to do something that puts Enron at risk though Thanks Cindy Andy Cowx To Cindy CT cc Nigel CT Subject Re Who should I talk to on this one Cindy We can provide a telephone number in the office which the traders can call from their mobile phone they would then be offered dialtone from the telephone system and can then dial on to an external party The call would then be routed out from the office and would be subject the the normal recording criteria However I wouldnt recommend this approach as we are opening up an external gateway for people to use our telephone system this would be unmetered and not secure The potential for tollfraud is something that we need to take into account Regards Andy Cowx Forwarded by Andy CowxLONECT on Nigel Denty To Cindy CT cc Andy CT Subject Re Who should I talk to on this one Ill ask Andy Cowx Telecoms Manager to investigate my initial thoughts are that technically this may not be possible regards Nigel Cindy Horn To Nigel CT cc Subject Who should I talk to on this one If the traders do a deal from their cell phone is there a way they can have that call routed back through the phones in the building so it gets done on a recorded line I know if you call someone and then dial some numbers it takes you to their cell phone Can it work backwards so they hit some numbers and it routes the call through the office This would help with some of our AA issues Thanks Cindy

MFN Layoffs etc Cc legal We have just been advised by a third party that MFN laid off of its work force today It has also been suggested that MFN has not paid any bills for weeks This is all third hand and should be verified

MFN ContractI have reviewed the MFN agreement and believe that should MFN fail to live up to its end of the Agreement our sole remedy is termination see section s extracted below I understand from Pete Castrejana that should MFN fail to provide service w e have no functionally equivalent fallback position at least in the short term Given this I believe we have placed ourselves in an unenviable ris k position going forward It is my suggestion that irrespective of the resolution to this lien issue or MFN financing issues we reopen negotiations to obtain the right to inte rvene and negotiate on our own behalf with any party contracted with by MFN We should attempt to include language which contractually binds MFN to m ake such contracted services and Authorizations assignable to us should M FN fail to perform Termination as our sole remedy is in this case not sound risk mitigation Section states emphisis added Prior to delivery MFN will obtain all material and applicable authorizatio ns leases licenses easements rights of way franchises approvals perm its orders consents and all other rights required for MFN to operate and maintain the MFN Network and provide Leased Fiber to Customer collectivel y the Authorizations and will use commercially reasonable efforts to ma intain or renew all such Authorizations throughout the Lease Term If any Authorizations are modified or terminated threatening to cause or causing material financial harm to MFN or preventing or materially interfering wit h MFNs control possession andor use of the MFN Network or its ability to provide the Leased Fiber then MFN in its sole discretion will i provi de Customer with a comparable product on alternate portions of MFNs then e xisting MFN Network or on networks of third parties or ii terminate this Agreement with respect to the affected Leased Fiber without further obliga tion or liability to Customer The forgoing is MFNs sole and exclusive li ability and Customers sole and exclusive remedy with respect to terminatio n as a result of the loss of an Authorization Section LIMITATION OF LIABILITY INDEMNIFICATION specifically excludes our seeking any consequential punitive indirect damages or lost revenue even in the event of a breach of contract
